com.css.app.document.keyword.model.DocKe.insert: insert into DOC_KEYWORD( WORD_ID, CONTENT, WORD_TYPE) values( WORD_ID, CONTENT, WORD_TYPE)
com.css.app.document.keyword.model.DocKe.updateContent: update DOC_KEYWORD set CONTENT = CONTENT where WORD_ID = WORD_ID
com.css.app.document.keyword.model.DocKe.delete: delete from DOC_KEYWORD where WORD_ID = WORD_ID
com.css.app.document.keyword.model.DocKe.deleteByIds: delete from DOC_KEYWORD where WORD_ID in (WORD_ID_STR)
com.css.app.document.keyword.model.DocKe.selectById: select WORD_ID, CONTENT, WORD_TYPE from DOC_KEYWORD where WORD_ID = WORD_ID
com.css.app.document.keyword.model.DocKe.selectByType: select WORD_ID, CONTENT, WORD_TYPE from DOC_KEYWORD where WORD_TYPE = WORD_TYPE order by CONTENT
com.css.app.document.keyword.model.DocKe.searchByContent: select WORD_ID, CONTENT, WORD_TYPE from DOC_KEYWORD where CONTENT = CONTENT
com.css.app.document.keyword.model.DocKe.checkUnique: select count(WORD_ID) from DOC_KEYWORD where CONTENT = CONTENT and WORD_ID != WORD_ID
com.css.app.document.keyword.model.DocKe.selectByParentId: select WORD_ID, CONTENT, WORD_TYPE from DOC_KEYWORD where WORD_ID in (select CHILD_ID from DOC_KEYWORD_TREE where PARENT_ID = PARENT_ID) order by CONTENT
com.css.app.document.keyword.model.DocKe.selectByDocId: select KEY_WORD from DOC_MULTI_ATTR_KEYWORD where DOC_ID = DOC_ID order by KEY_WORD
